title: 140.7.1esr IMAP delay when moving messages (7-second delay)
creator: glozon
content:
Hi,

Since updating to Thunderbird 140.7.1esr (64-bit) on Windows 11, moving messages from Inbox to any folder takes about 7 seconds.

Details:

Account type: IMAP (Cogeco)

Happens in all folders

Inbox has ~600 messages (not large)

Was working normally before the recent update

Delay occurs every time moving a message from Inbox to another folder

No freezing — just a delay before the move completes

No antivirus changes

Issue started immediately after update

This appears to be related to IMAP sync behavior introduced in 140.x.

Has anyone else reported this, or is there a known regression?

Thank you.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:140.7.1esr;os:Windows 11

title: Authentifizierung eines AOL Mailkontos funktioniert nicht
creator: frank-solingen
content:
Hallo, ich habe seit 2 Wochen Probleme mit der Authentifizierung meines Mailaccounds von AOL. Alles was ich Versuche funktioniert nicht. Ich bekomme jedesmal im eingeblendeten AOL Autentifizierungs Fenster die Meldung "etwas ist schiefgelaufen. Ich habe in meinem AOL Account schon mehrerer Male ein App Passwort für Thunderbird erstellt. Habe dieses App Passwort Thunderbird genannt. Konto ist ein SMTP IMAP Konto, die Ports stimmen auch. Ich habe mein AOL Mailkonto mittlerweile in Thunderbird komplett gelöscht und ebenfalls die AOL Passwörter gelöscht. Die Authentifizierungsmethode für outh2 ist angewählt und Cookies sind eingeschaltet.

Ich kann machen was ich will. Die Autentifizierung funktioniert nicht.

Woran kann das noch liegen. Ich bin mittlerweile ratlos.

Frank

title: ok, I don't know what wrong I did, but all my mail files under --RIMOSSO--@gmail.com disappeared, is it possible to have them restored? Thanks.
creator: chiantor35
content:
let me explain what I did before and after those files disappeared

1) due to the fact that the directory Parole_Al_Giorno was becoming too big, I did, then I moved those mail in three directories Parole_Al_Giorno_2023, Parole_Al_Giorno_2024, Parole_Al_Giorno_2025

2) then I removed Parole_Al_Giorno and all seemed to work perfectly, so I went to bed... I don't remember the time, but "ore piccole" we say in Italy.

3) the morning after the surprise... all my files, not just those moved, all directories were disappeared

4) no problem, I thougt, let me connect to Gmail.com, for sure there I will find my files... not at all, sorry , even Gmail.com was empty.

title: My thunderbird program receives message, but after the change of the operator the sending does not succeed.
creator: aarno.laitila
content:
I have used my address for more than two decades with an e-mail program, as well as with a webmail program. Since archiving the important messages is easier done with Thunderbird, I wish to use it also in the future. My thunderbird program receives messages ok, but after the change of the operator the sending does not succeed. After trying to send anything I receive a message of "Disallowed host".

Here are the settings in Finnish: Voisitko tarkistaa Thunderbirdistä seuraavat asetukset: 

   Avaa Thunderbird → Tiliasetukset    Valitse “Lähtevän postin palvelin (SMTP)”    Tarkista että:        Portti on 587        Yhteysturva STARTTLS        Autentikointi Normaali salasana        Käyttäjätunnus on koko sähköpostiosoite        SMTP-palvelin on sähköpostipalvelun oma (ei vanhan internetoperaattorin smtp-palvelin)

Hopefully something could be done. Best regards, Aarno Laitila

title: Problem linking existing Thunderbird calendar to Google Calendar
creator: pfvincent
content:
For many years I have had a Thunderbird Calendar, and have a large number of Tasks set up in it. I have now decided it would be convenient to link it to my Google calendar, so that it also shows on my new Windows 11 machine and on my laptop. I've gone through the process described in the "Create new calendars" article, to link the calendars, and the Google calendar is now appearing in the Thunderbird calendar, but not vice versa. How do I get the Tasks in the Thunderbird calendar to appear in the Google calendar?

I am running Thunderbird 140.7.1esr and Firefox 147.03 on my Windows 10 machine, which I used to set up the link. My Windows 11 machine has the same Firefox build, but Thunderbird 147.0.1, and the Google calendar display is the same, but I haven't yet set up the Thunderbird calendar on the new machine.

title: Type in Thunderbird on new computer not great
creator: Upplander
content:
I use Linux Cinnamon Mint on two Dell desktops - they are set up identically and perform in the same way with one exception. Both appear to be the same version of Thunderbird and have identical settings but on one computer the appearance of the typeface (in for example a listing of emails) is less clear /sharp than on the other.

When I say they are the same version - they both say 140.7.1esr (64-bit) but after that on one computer it says "Thunderbird for Linux Mint -mint-001 - 1.0". This qualification appears on the computer where the typeface is less clear but not on the other.

I should add that the issue seems to relate solely to Thunderbird - it does not present when looking at (say) websites on Firefox.

Being of a certain age clarity is important and I just wonder if I am missing something? Thanks for any help.
metadata: ;os:Linux;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:140.7.1esr (64-bit)

title: e-Mails nicht erhalten
creator: harry.kuehn
content:
Hallo,

ich erhalte meine e-Mails auf meinem Laptop via Thunderbird. Als ich letzte Woche nach einer einwöchigen Abwesenheit meine e-Mails checken wollte, zeigte mir das System 178 erhaltene e-Mails an. Als ich meinen Posteingang öffnete, zeigte es nur 78 an, die auch existierten. Es fehlten somit 100 e-Mails. Liegt das an Thunderbird oder muss ich meinen e-Mail-Supporter (1&1) kontaktieren? Da ich kein "Computer-Freak" bin, bin ich ziemlich hilflos und würde mich freuen, wenn ich von Euch Hilfe bekommen könnte.

Vielen Dank im Voraus für möglichen Support und hilfreiche Antworten an meine e-Mail-Adresse harry.kuehn@online.de.

Herzliche Grüße aus Berlin Harry Kühn
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:???;os:Windows 10
